# Phylogenetic Effects {#phylogenetic}
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
library(dplyr)
library(flair)
library(lme4)
library(MCMCglmm)
library(scales)
library(squidSim)
library(knitr)
set.seed(25)
```
## Brownian motion


```{r}
library(ape)

data(bird.families)

squid_dat <- simulate_population(
	data_structure=data.frame(taxon=bird.families$tip.label),
	parameters=list(
		taxon=list(
			vcov=1
		),
		residual=list(
			vcov=1
		)
	),
	phylogeny=list(taxon=bird.families)
)

pop_dat <- get_population_data(squid_dat)
var(pop_dat$taxon_effect)

```


```{r}
library(MCMCglmm)
Ainv<-inverseA(bird.families)$Ainv
prior<-list(
	R=list(V=1, nu=0.002), 
	G=list(G1=list(V=1, nu=0.002)))

model2<-MCMCglmm(y~1, 
	random=~taxon, 
	ginverse=list(taxon=Ainv),
	data=pop_dat, 
	prior=prior, 
	verbose=FALSE, nitt=13000, burnin=3000, thin=10)

summary(model2)

```
